|brand = Technologic Systems |model = TS-7800 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -V2 |revision = Rev A |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 13 May 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Technologic_Systems_TS-7800-V2 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ADHKWILC3000U |icid = 20266-WILC3000UA |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820;Armada 385; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.33 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAJCN-4M IT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Alliance Memory;AS4C256M16D3LB-12BIN; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1512; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = F8:F0:05
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SATA 3.0, Mini PCIe, PC/104 bus, SD Card slot, Micro SD card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 2 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = 2-pin Molex
|serial = yes,, USB Female (Micro-B),, console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, Micro SD card slot, ADC, RTC w/ battery, Bluetooth 5.0, DIO, PWM, RS485, temperature sensor, hardware watchdog, accelerometer, SPI, I2C, CAN Bus, UART, GPIO |addchip = FPGA w/ 20K LUTs;Altera;EP4CGX22;;1;,,, 5V RS232 Transceiver;Sipex;SP213E;;1;,,, 16Mb Serial Flash Memory;ISSI;IS25LP016D;;1;,,, High-Speed CAN Transceiver;NXP;TJA1050T;;1;,,, Serial Real Time Clock Chip;STMicro;M41T00S;;1;,,, Half-Duplex RS-485 Transceiver;Exar Corp;SP485E;;2;,,, Full Speed USB Flash MCU;Silicon Labs;C8051F381;;1;,,, 3-axis, 14-bit/8-bit Digital Accelerometer;NXP;MMA8451Q;;1;,,, High-Performance RS232 Line Driver/Reciever;Sipex;SP202E;;1;,,, 8-bit Shift Register w/ 3-State Output Registers;TI;SN74AHC595;;3;,,, Quadruple 2-Line to 1-Line Data Selector;TI;SN74LVC257A;;3;,,, Octal Bus Transceiver w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC245A;;1;,,, High-Speed CMOS 10-bit Bus Switch w/ FLow-Through Pinout;IDT;IDTQS3861;;3; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2018 |estprice = 300 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Microchip ATWILC3000-MR110UA |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad1chip1 = Atmel;ATWILC3000; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 ''Armada 385'' :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.33GHz *Storage: 4GB (NAND) Flash, SATA 3, mSATA (optional), :TF card (max.32GB)/MMC card slot, SDHC card slot *Memory: 1GB (DDR) SDRAM *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn *Network: 1x 1GbE port *Power Source: 5V/1A via 2-pin Molex
==Links of Interest== ===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-7800-V2 ''Board Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedTS ''Code Respository'']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Technologic Systems TS-7800-V2 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Technologic Systems TS-7800-V2 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
